member.name: T:JetBrains.CommandLine.Products.Installer.AutomationToolsWithExtraPackagesListing
member.summary: Lists the extra packages which should be added to the original RSAT packages to make

member.name: T:JetBrains.CommandLine.Products.Installer.AutomationToolsArchiveFile
member.summary: The regular Automation Tools Archive file (.zip or .tar.gz) for the IPZ build. Takes just the RSAT product.

member.name: T:JetBrains.CommandLine.Products.Installer.ReSharperAutomationToolsZipsDeployableFile
member.summary: Target artifact for the TeamCity build named ReSharperAutomationToolsZips. Has been created to prototype adding the C++ support files to the RSAT ZIP file. The main complication is that the IPZ build references the main CPP build which is 32-bit, while for the RSAT package we need the 64-bit version.
